General.Name: Synergy Green Industries Limited
General.Description: Synergy Green Industries Limited engages in the manufacture of castings in India and internationally. The company offers industrial, turbine, metal, and steel castings; and windmill parts. Its products include pump casing, rear wheel, main frame, valve body, wall body, wedge, cannon tube, main bearing housing, gear box housing, hub, front wheel, main foundation, base frame, main axle, hollow shaft, DV-casing, diffuser, cone head, eccentric23, and upper frame. The company was incorporated in 2010 and is based in Kolhapur, India.

3.Name: Mr. Vendavagali Srinivasa Reddy
3.Title: Exec. Director of Technical & Whole Time Director
